definition: to press/to push/to leave aside or shelve/to control/to restrain/to keep one's hand on/to check or refer to/according to/in the light of/(of an editor or author) to make a comment
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

sentences.english: Thirdly, Units and individuals shall keep the invoices according to stipulations.
sentences.chinese: 三是用票单位和个人应当按规定保管发票。

sentences.english: Software copyright holders must pay a registration fee according to the rules.
sentences.chinese: 软件著作权人还应当按规定交纳登记费。

sentences.english: Students should register in the International Student Office on time in accordance with the term schedule.
sentences.chinese: 专业生和语言生均须按规定时间到留学生办公室报到。

sentences.english: Revenue from government-controlled funds was used exclusively for its intended purposes.
sentences.chinese: 政府性基金收入按规定专款专用。

sentences.english: The customs shall charge issuance fee in accordance with the provisions.
sentences.chinese: 海关按规定收取签证费。

sentences.english: Preheating shall also be applied to the tack welding, when the weldment requires preheating.
sentences.chinese: 需要预热的焊件，定位焊时也应按规定进行预热。

sentences.english: The working pressure of safety valve should be set as per the applicable Standards.
sentences.chinese: 安全阀的工作压力须按规定整定。

sentences.english: Receivers of such certificates may apply to the customs for registration according to relevant regulations.
sentences.chinese: 取得报关员资格证书者可以按规定向海关申请注册。

sentences.english: The effectiveness of the drugs depends heavily upon taking them exactly as prescribed.
sentences.chinese: 药物的有效性很大程度上取决是否完全按规定服用。

sentences.english: My son is always unwilling to practise upon the piano as regularly as he should have done.
sentences.chinese: 我儿子总是不愿意按规定应该做的那样来练钢琴。

sentences.english: We can dispose the presented sample pursuant to certain provisions after the completion of report.
sentences.chinese: 我单位可以在完成报告后按规定处置送检样品。

sentences.english: They supply the canneries with set quantities of fruits meeting specified standards.
sentences.chinese: 他们按规定数量向罐头厂提供合格水果。

sentences.english: An arrangement of typing and function keys laid out in a specified manner.
sentences.chinese: 按规定的样式布局打字键和功能键的一种排列。

sentences.english: Press formulary cycle well equipment cleaning job.
sentences.chinese: 按规定周期做好设备的清洁工作。

sentences.english: Other acts of printing invoices and producing special products for anti-forged invoices not in accordance with stipulations.
sentences.chinese: 其他未按规定印制发票和生产发票防伪专用品的行为。

sentences.english: The institution of import and export commodities inspection should inspect the commodities declared for export strictly according to the regulations.
sentences.chinese: 商检机构对报关出口的货物应严格按规定进行商检。

definition: according to provisions/as stipulated in the rules
provision/to fix/to set/to formulate/to stipulate/to provide/regulation/rule/CL:個|个[ge4]
to audit and determine/to check and ratify/to appraise and decide/determination/on a deemed basis (taxation)/to deem
